title: Print, "Letters C and D, four Baluze, "Histoire generale de la Maison d'Auvergne"", 1707–08
signed: Under the left bottom corner: "S. 1. C. f."
description:
A:  [Meaume 13 I, 14 I, 15 I]  A medallion showing a lioness is suspended from the top of the C.  A cathedral in the right distance. 
B:  [Meaume 16 I, 17 I, 18I]  A shield with a dolphin is suspended from the D.  Mitre and crozier are shown in the rear.

tombstone.epitaph: Print, "Letters C and D, four Baluze, "Histoire generale de la Maison d'Auvergne"", 1707–08. Paper. 1907-7-30-b.
